    • isThereObjects

      public boolean isThereObjects(int listIndicative, int idLevel)
      Description: This method verifies if there is an object in the list to analyze
      Parameters:
      listIndicative - int: It is the indicative of the type of list to analyze. 1 = list of treasures 2 = list of monster
      idLevel - int: It is the id of the level´s position in the level array
      Returns:
      boolean: If there is an object in the list, it returns true. If there is not, it returns false

    • registerPlayer

      public boolean registerPlayer(String nickname, String name)
      Description: This method register a player. It creates a Player object and saves it in the player array.
      Parameters:
      nickname - String: It is the nickname of the player.
      name - String: It is the name of the player
      Returns:
      boolean: If the register was successful, it returns true. If it was not, it returns false

    • verifyNickname

      public boolean verifyNickname(String nicknameToVerify)
      Description: This method checks that the player nickname is unique
      Parameters:
      nicknameToVerify - String: It is the nickname that has to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean: If the nickname is unique, it returns true. If it is not, it returns false

    • registerLevel

      public boolean registerLevel(double growthConstant, int requiredScore)
      Description: This method register the levels. It creates 10 Level objects and saves them in the level array.
      Parameters:
      growthConstant - double: It saves the growth constant that is applied to increase the required score of the levels while creating them
      requiredScore - int: It saves the required score of the first level
      Returns:
      boolean: If the register was successful, it returns true. If it was not, it returns false

    • registerTreasure

      public boolean registerTreasure(String name, String linkUrl, int remPoints)
      Description: This method register a treasure. It create a Treasure object and saves it in the trasure array.
      Parameters:
      name - String: It saves the name of the treasure
      linkUrl - String: It saves the url of the treasure
      remPoints - int: It saves the remuneration points of the treasure
      Returns:
      boolean: If the register was successful, it returns true. If it was not, it returns false

    • registerMonster

      public boolean registerMonster(String name, int monsterIndicative, int negativePoints, int remPoints)
      Description: This method register a treasure. It create a Treasure object and saves it in the trasure array.
      Parameters:
      name - String: It saves the name of the monster
      monsterIndicative - int: It is the indicative of monster type
      negativePoints - int: It saves the negative points of the monster
      remPoints - int: It saves the remuneration points of the monster
      Returns:
      boolean: If the register was successful, it returns true. If it was not, it returns false

    • associateTreasureToLevel

      public boolean associateTreasureToLevel(int idLevel, int idTreasure, int amountTreasures)
      Description: This method associates a certain amount of treasure objects to a level saving them in the treasure array of a certain level chosen by the user.
      Parameters:
      idLevel - int: It saves the level id of the selected level by the user
      idTreasure - int: It saves the treasure id of the selected treasure by the user
      amountTreasures - int: It saves the amount of treasures that the user wants to associate to determined level
      Returns:
      boolean: If the association was successful, it returns true. If it was not, it returns false

    • associateMonsterToLevel

      public boolean associateMonsterToLevel(int idLevel, int idMonster)
      Description: This method associates a monster objects to a level saving it in the monster array of a certain level chosen by the user.
      Parameters:
      idLevel - int: It saves the level id of the selected level by the user
      idMonster - int: It saves the monster id of the selected monster by the user
      Returns:
      boolean: If the association was successful, it returns true. If it was not, it returns false

      newScore - int: It saves the new player score
      Returns:
      boolean: If the modification was successful, it returns true. If it was not, it returns false
